author: Avi Selk
title: From Yemen to America: These people were stranded. Now they’re free.
text: From Yemen to America: These people were stranded. Now they’re free. Please enable flash to watch this video. Sorry, this video is not available. Your browser does not currently support live streaming video. Play Video Live Video - Yemeni brothers Ammar and Tareq Aquel Mohammad Aziz reunite with their father in the United States on February 6th. The brothers had been stranded in Addis Ababa and Djibouti after their visas were revoked when President Trump signed an executive order temporarily banning visa-holders from seven Muslim-majority countries from entering the United States.
